name: FFF: Fuzzy Frenemies Fiesta
description:
Welcome to Fuzzy Frenemies Fiesta!

Challenge your friends and enjoy together the fiesta!

Each player has to collect the gems that fall from the sky and dodge the bombs! But it's more complicated than that...

  • Each red gem adds 5 points to your score.
  • Each blue gem adds half of the points you have.
  • Each yellow gem copies the last gem effect. But if your last gem was a yellow gem... you'll lose all your points!

Obviously, the bombs explode your score... so try to dodge them hehehe
